item.title: How virtual but real architecture can help save your time and money
item.description:
Description

Krystian Różycki discusses the benefits of virtual architecture and serverless solutions. He also compares the pros and cons of platforms such as AWS, Azure, Kubernetes, Google Cloud Platform, and more.

Presentation at the 2019 Tech Power Summit by STX Next.

Get more guides, news, and videos from STX Next: Website - https://stxnext.com LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/stx-next-python-experts/ Twitter - https://twitter.com/STXNext Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/StxNext/ Behance - https://www.behance.net/STXNextTeam Dribbble - https://dribbble.com/STXNext/ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/stx_next/
item.dc:creator: Krystian Różycki

item.title: Reinforcement learning in computer games AI
item.description:
Description

Tomasz Maćkowiak demonstrates the power of reinforcement learning for training AI bots in a simple computer game. He then puts the AI to the test against a human opponent—with serious cash on the line.

Presentation at the 2019 Tech Power Summit by STX Next.

Get more guides, news, and videos from STX Next: Website - https://stxnext.com LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/stx-next-python-experts/ Twitter - https://twitter.com/STXNext Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/StxNext/ Behance - https://www.behance.net/STXNextTeam Dribbble - https://dribbble.com/STXNext/ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/stx_next/
item.dc:creator: Tomasz Maćkowiak

item.title: Seeing through Python's eyes, computer vision for all
item.description:
Description

Maciej Urbański presents the applications of Python for computer vision, including face detection, object detection, multi-object tracking, and pose estimation.

Presentation at the 2019 Tech Power Summit by STX Next.

Get more guides, news, and videos from STX Next: Website - https://stxnext.com LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/stx-next-python-experts/ Twitter - https://twitter.com/STXNext Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/StxNext/ Behance - https://www.behance.net/STXNextTeam Dribbble - https://dribbble.com/STXNext/ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/stx_next/
